item.title: 贝莱德与微软的AI合作迄今已筹集125亿美元
item.description: 贝莱德公司已筹集125亿美元资金，作为与微软公司合作的一部分，用于资助数据中心和能源基础设施建设，以此推进其从人工智能热潮中获利的计划。【原文：BlackRock Inc. has raised $12.5 billion as part of a partnership with Microsoft Corp. to bankroll data centers and energy infrastructure, advancing its efforts to cash in on the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 南非关闭克鲁格国家公园，致命洪水已造成数十人死亡
item.description: 致命洪水迫使南非标志性克鲁格国家公园暂停接待游客，此前该国东北部及邻国莫桑比克遭遇极端降雨，造成数十人丧生。【原文：Deadly floods prompted South Africa’s iconic Kruger National Park to shut to further visitors, after extreme rainfall killed dozens in the northeast of the country and neighboring Mozambique.】

item.title: EnBW因未获英国政府支持而取消两个海上风电项目
item.description: 巴登-符腾堡能源公司（EnBW Energie Baden-Württemberg AG）因未能在最新分配轮次中获得政府支持，已暂停两个英国海上风电项目，此举将引发数十亿欧元的强制减值。【原文：EnBW Energie Baden-Württemberg AG has halted two UK offshore wind projects after failing to secure government support in the latest allocation round, triggering mandatory impairments worth billions of euros.】

item.title: 美国要求盟友加强针对中国关键矿产的措施
item.description: 美国将于下月召集数十位盟国外交部长，商讨一项旨在帮助各国减少对中国关键矿物依赖的协议。【原文：The US will convene dozens of foreign ministers from allied countries next month to pursue an agreement designed to help the countries reduce their dependency on Chinese critical minerals.】

item.title: 富国银行财报发布后启动美元债券发售
item.description: 富国银行正进军美国高评级债券市场，华尔街大型贷款机构在财报发布后预计将掀起债券发售热潮。【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. is tapping the US high-grade market in an expected rush of bond sales from big Wall Street lenders after earnings.】

item.title: Liquid Telecom 筹备再融资谈判，债务到期在即
item.description: 据知情人士透露，泛非光纤公司Liquid Telecommunications正加速推进再融资谈判，因其6.2亿美元债券将于9月到期。【原文：Pan-African fiber company Liquid Telecommunications is moving closer to refinancing talks as a $620 million bond maturity looms in September, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新兴股市保持稳定，台积电计划激发投资者兴趣
item.description: 新兴市场股市基本持平，全球最大芯片制造商台积电雄心勃勃的支出计划提振了全球人工智能相关股票的投资情绪。【原文：Emerging-market stocks were little changed as ambitious spending plans by Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co, the world’s largest chip-maker, lifted sentiment for AI-linked shares across the world.】

item.title: Insight Partners聘请风投老将Malayery推动二级市场投资
item.description: 专注科技领域的私募资产管理公司Insight Partners正进军二级市场，从竞争对手处挖来高管，负责其首个专注于支持续期基金及收购二手股权的投资策略。【原文：Tech-focused private-asset firm Insight Partners is breaking into secondaries, bringing on an executive from a rival to lead its first strategy dedicated to backing continuation funds and snapping up secondhand stakes.】

item.title: 美银称欧洲房地产具有数十年来最大上涨空间
item.description: 据美国银行分析师预测，欧洲房地产股有望迎来数十年来最佳回报，因利率趋稳且估值低于历史水平将推动其上涨。【原文：European real estate stocks are poised for their best returns in decades, according to Bank of America analysts, who foresee a boost from steadier interest rates and valuations below historical levels.】

item.title: 中国反对对伊朗动武，特朗普言论引发不安
item.description: 中国外交部长向伊朗外长表示，北京反对在国际关系中使用武力。此前美国威胁将对伊朗发动攻击，因德黑兰当局对示威者实施了暴力镇压。【原文：China’s top diplomat told his Iranian counterpart that Beijing opposes the use of force in international relations, following US threats of an attack after Tehran’s violent crackdown against protesters.】

item.title: 万事达卡、维萨卡与Revolut在伦敦诉讼中败诉，涉及信用卡手续费上限问题
item.description: 万事达卡公司、维萨公司和英国金融科技公司Revolut Ltd.在与英国监管机构的诉讼中败诉，该诉讼涉及英国监管机构计划对跨境信用卡手续费设定上限。【原文：Mastercard Inc., Visa Inc. and UK fintech Revolut Ltd. lost a lawsuit with the UK regulator over its plans to usher in a cap on cross-border card fees.】

item.title: 欧盟碳价延续涨势，天然气价格飙升而核电产量下滑
item.description: 欧洲碳价延续一周涨势，天然气成本飙升、核电供应疲软以及天气转冷的预期，预计将推高排放许可需求。【原文：European carbon prices extended a week-long gain, with surging natural gas costs, weaker nuclear power supply and forecasts for colder weather expected to drive demand for emissions permits.】

item.title: 庞巴迪将在魁北克增设新工厂以提升产能
item.description: 加拿大飞机制造商庞巴迪公司将投资1亿加元（约合7200万美元），在蒙特利尔附近建设新的制造中心以扩大产能。【原文：Canadian jet maker Bombardier Inc. will invest C$100 million ($72 million) to build a new manufacturing center near Montreal to increase its production capacity.】

item.title: 德国政府出手资助Domo破产化工厂
item.description: 德国萨克森-安哈尔特州将临时资助位于莱乌纳的Domo化工有限公司破产的塑料生产基地，以防止可能造成损害的停产。【原文：Germany’s state of Saxony-Anhalt will temporarily finance Domo Chemicals GmbH’s insolvent plastics production site in Leuna to prevent a potentiallly damaging shutdown.】

item.title: 南非提议制定更严格的法律以监控资金流动
item.description: 南非政府提议修改法律，旨在赋予政府更强有力的工具来监控资金流动，并对从事金融犯罪者实施更严厉的处罚。【原文：South Africa proposed changes to laws that would give the government stronger tools to monitor money flows and impose tougher penalties on those engaging in financial crimes.】

item.title: 莫斯科接近达成协议，收购受制裁的塞尔维亚炼油厂中俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司的股份
item.description: 匈牙利能源公司莫尔股份公司即将完成对塞尔维亚唯一炼油厂的收购，此前美国制裁迫使俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司旗下子公司出售其控股股权。【原文：Hungarian energy company Mol Nyrt. is closing in on the takeover of Serbia’s sole refinery as US sanctions force Russia’s Gazprom Neft PJSC to sell its majority stake.】

item.title: 巴西央行在犯罪调查中清算里格信托基金
item.description: 巴西中央银行清算了CBSF证券分销公司（原名Reag Trust），此前该集团因涉嫌与有组织犯罪及Banco Master银行存在关联而遭到长达数月的调查。【原文：Brazil’s central bank liquidated CBSF Distribuidora de Titulos e Valores Mobiliarios SA, the firm previously known as Reag Trust, following months-long probes into the group’s alleged links to organized crime and Banco Master SA.】

item.title: 英国向欧洲展示如何维持海上风电发展
item.description: 昨日的拍卖促成了四个大型风电场的规划，而其他国家却在努力吸引开发商的兴趣。【原文：Yesterday’s auction resulted in plans for four huge wind farms, while other countries struggle to attract developer interest.】

item.title: 特斯拉与xAI的关联引发对"马斯克经济"的质疑
item.description: 这家人工智能初创公司与这家公共汽车制造商的关系将进一步深化。【原文：The AI startup and public carmaker are headed for a tighter relationship.】

item.title: 德国正点燃经济增长转型的希望
item.description: 欧洲最大经济体在经历了三年基本停滞后，近期迎来了一系列好转的经济数据。【原文：Europe’s biggest economy has just seen a flurry of improving numbers after three largely lost years.】

item.title: 卡尼访华之际，加拿大与特朗普政府关系趋于紧张
item.description: 此次访问紧随特朗普对美国与加拿大自由贸易协定的轻蔑言论之后。【原文：The trip comes on the heels of Trump’s dismissive remarks about the US’s free-trade deal with Canada】

item.description:
资本支出预测表明，强劲的基本面正推动人工智能的蓬勃发展。

【原文：

Capital spending forecast points to the powerful fundamentals driving AI boom.

item.title: Spotify在美国将高级订阅价格上调至每月13美元
item.description: Spotify Technology SA正将其高级订阅服务价格上调8%，以期实现持续盈利。【原文：Spotify Technology SA is raising the price of its premium subscription service by 8% in an effort to achieve sustained profitability.】

item.title: 调查显示，在里夫斯公布预算案前，抵押贷款需求出现下滑
item.description: 英国央行调查显示，尽管其他迹象表明房地产市场正在复苏，但英国抵押贷款需求在11月预算案公布前已出现下滑，预计未来三个月将进一步下降。【原文：Demand in the UK for mortgages dropped in the build up to the November budget and is expected to fall further in the coming three months, according to a Bank of England survey, despite other signs that the housing market is picking up.】

item.title: 生成式AI投资者获得新工具，可追踪OpenAI与xAI的表现
item.description: 投资者将能通过一项监测该领域的新指数，更密切地追踪包括Anthropic、OpenAI和xAI Corp.在内的生成式人工智能公司的表现。【原文：Investors will be able to track the performance of generative artificial intelligence companies including Anthropic, OpenAI and xAI Corp. more closely with a new index monitoring the sector.】

item.title: 埃尔莫蒂称瑞银正在拟定潜在继任者名单
item.description: 瑞银集团首席执行官塞尔吉奥·埃尔莫蒂表示，该行正在物色接替人选，同时重申他预计将在一年左右卸任。【原文：UBS Group AG Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti said the bank is in the process of identifying candidates to replace him while reiterating he expects to step aside within about a year.】

item.title: 私人信贷机构降低保障措施，以华尔街条款赢得交易
item.description: 私营信贷公司试图从华尔街获取杠杆债务业务，却付出了高昂代价——那些曾使它们在经济衰退中更具抗风险能力的保障措施。【原文：Private credit firms’ efforts to reap leveraged debt business from Wall Street is coming at a steep cost — safeguards that made them less vulnerable to an economic downturn.】

item.title: 印度最高法院裁定老虎环球基金须为Flipkart缴纳税款
item.description: 印度最高法院裁定，美国投资公司Tiger Global在2018年向沃尔玛出售Flipkart股权所产生的资本收益，根据印度国内法律应纳税。此裁决对Tiger Global构成打击。【原文：India’s Supreme Court has held that Tiger Global’s capital gains arising from its 2018 stake sale in Flipkart to Walmart Inc. are taxable under domestic law in a setback for the US investment firm.】

item.title: 贝莱德总资产突破14万亿美元创纪录，ETF规模激增
item.description: 贝莱德集团第四季度共吸纳客户资金3420亿美元，推动公司资产规模攀升至创纪录的14万亿美元。随着近期一系列收购的整合，该公司正逐步成为私募市场的强大力量。【原文：BlackRock Inc. pulled in $342 billion of total client cash in the fourth quarter, pushing the firm to a record $14 trillion of assets as it integrates a string of recent acquisitions to become a force in private markets.】

item.title: 股市平静掩盖了个股剧烈波动
item.description: 巴克莱银行策略师指出，美国股市数月来弥漫的平静氛围，掩盖了个股中前所未有的剧烈波动。【原文：The sense of calm that has pervaded the US stock market for months is masking unprecedented bursts of volatility in individual shares, say Barclays Plc strategists.】
